thread.title: Netflix is Now as Big as Disney

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Netflix is Now as Big as Disney
text:
Netflix Inc. has become as valuable as Walt and , the latest sign that investors remain faithful to the handful of technology and internet firms that have long powered the broader market. The streaming company on Thursday closed with a market value of $151.8 billion, after earlier in the session passing Disney for the first […]
